Detects trackers via BLE and WiFi scanning

Related repos

  • Scans for trackers on Android devices
  • reverse engineering Apple Find My for Bluetooth tracking research
  • Adds tracking capabilities to any object detector
  • Tracks human poses through walls using WiFi signals
  • Sniffs Bluetooth traffic from Apple devices
  • Tracks Bluetooth devices via the Find My network
  • Network IP scanner with web dashboard, tracks devices and notifies on new connections
  • Unified library for multi-object tracking algorithms with modular design and easy integration
